name: @porsche-design-system/components
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.start: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'cdn,stencil' 'yarn start:cdn-server' 'yarn build:types && PDS_IS_STAGING=1 stencil build --watch --serve'
scripts.start:e2e-server: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'cdn,stencil' 'yarn start:cdn-server' 'if test "$CI" != true; then PDS_IS_STAGING=1 yarn build; fi && http-server ./dist/porsche-design-system -p 3333'
scripts.start:vrt-server: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'cdn,stencil' 'yarn start:cdn-server' 'if test "$CI" != true; then PDS_IS_STAGING=1 yarn build; fi && http-server -p 61423 -P http://localhost:61423/www'
scripts.start:cbt-server: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'cdn,stencil' 'yarn start:cdn-server' 'if test "$CI" != true; then PDS_IS_STAGING=1 yarn build; fi && http-server -p 61424 -P http://localhost:61424/www'
scripts.build: yarn build:types && PDS_IS_STAGING=${PDS_IS_STAGING:-1} stencil build --docs && yarn build:readme
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt && yarn test:cbt
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,e2e' 'yarn start:e2e-server' 'wait-on -t 300000 http-get://localhost:3333 && ts-node --project tests/e2e/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/e2e/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:vrt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,vrt' 'yarn start:vrt-server' 'wait-on -t 300000 http-get://localhost:61423 && ts-node --project tests/vrt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/vrt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:cbt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,cbt' 'yarn start:cbt-server' 'wait-on -t 300000 http-get://localhost:61424 && ts-node --project tests/cbt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/cbt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./yarn-error.log && rm -rf ./.stencil && rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf ./loader && rm -rf ./www
